name: UChaosPhysicalMaterial
doc:
Physical materials are used to define the response of a physical object when
interacting dynamically with the world.

Friction: Friction value of a surface in motion, controls how easily things can slide on this surface (0 is frictionless, higher values increase the amount of friction)
StaticFriction: Friction value of surface at rest, controls how easily things can slide on this surface (0 is frictionless, higher values increase the amount of friction)
Restitution: Restitution or 'bounciness' of this surface, between 0 (no bounce) and 1 (outgoing velocity is same as incoming).
LinearEtherDrag: Uniform linear ether drag, the resistance a body experiences to its translation.
AngularEtherDrag: Uniform angular ether drag, the resistance a body experiences to its rotation.
SleepingLinearVelocityThreshold: How much to scale the damage threshold by on any destructible we are applied to
SleepingAngularVelocityThreshold: How much to scale the damage threshold by on any destructible we are applied to
